Add a column with info of geocode match_type

Source: R/utils.R
add_precision_col.Rd

Add a column with info of geocode match_type

Usage

add_precision_col(con, update_tb = NULL)

Arguments

con

A db connection

update_tb

String. Name of a table to be updated in con

Value

Adds a new column to a table in con
